home.title: Home Page
home.description: A simple phone book, where you can add new contacts, delete them, look for or edit a specific one.

toast.duplicateExact: You can't create a contact with identical data
toast.duplicateNumberWarning: Warning: A contact with this phone number already exists! (A contact was still successfully added!)
toast.closeModalBeforeAdding: Close the current modal before adding another contact!
toast.cantAddWhileEditing: You can't add another contact while editing!
toast.closeModalBeforeDeleting: Close the current modal before deleting all contacts!
toast.cantDeleteWhileEditing: You can't delete all contacts while editing!

deleteAllModal.confirmText1: Are you sure you want to delete
deleteAllModal.warningText: You won't be able to restore them!

searchBox.toastModalSearch: Close the current modal before searching!
searchBox.toastEditingSearch: You can't search some other contacts while editing one!
searchBox.toastSuggestName: Seems like you meant to search by name instead.
searchBox.toastSuggestNumber: Seems like you meant to search by number instead.
searchBox.toastModalSwitch: Close the current modal before changing search mode!
searchBox.toastEditingSwitch: You can't change search method while editing a contact!

sortControl.promptShow: Do you want to sort the contacts?
sortControl.promptHide: If you don't want to sort already, click it again!
sortControl.infoSave: (It will save your current sorting method!)
sortControl.toastModalToggle: Close the current modal before pressing this button!
sortControl.toastEditingToggle: You can't press this button while editing a contact!
sortControl.toastModalChange: Close the current modal before choosing a sorting method!
sortControl.toastEditingChange: You can't sort the contacts while editing one!

toasts.loginFail: No one has registered under this data yet!
toasts.escapeTip: Tip: All modals can be closed by pressing Escape!
Tip: All modals can be closed by pressing Escape!
toasts.error: Some of the data had been earlier used by another user!

languageSelector.toastModal: Close the current modal before changing the language!
languageSelector.toastEditing: You can't change the language while editing!

contact.errorModalOpen: Cannot perform action while another modal is open
contact.errorEditingOther: Cannot perform action while editing another contact
contact.confirmDelete: Are you sure you want to delete "{{name}}"?
contact.confirmDeleteEmpty: Name and number cannot both be empty. You want to delete the contact instead?
contact.deletedEmptyFields: Contact deleted due to empty fields
contact.unsavedChanges: You have unsaved changes. Are you sure you want to exit?

themeToggle.infoText: You can also change your theme!

errors.closeModalFirst: Close the current modal before changing the theme!
errors.cannotChangeWhileEditing: You can't change the theme while editing!

userMenu.modalText: Are you sure you want to <1>log out?</1>

errors.editing: You can't logout while editing a contact!
errors.modalOpen: Close the current modal before logging out!
